intents.answer: I design modular, scalable and secure backend architectures using modern patterns and clean engineering principles.
I build AI-powered automation systems that streamline engineering workflows and reduce manual effort.
I create premium SaaS dashboards with modern UX, clean design and internationalization support.
You can reach me through the contact form. I usually reply within 24 hours.

fallback: I'm not sure about that yet, but I can help you with backend architecture, AI automation or SaaS dashboards.
